name: Teleportis
description:
Teleportis, a simple platforming game with two main abilities and style stolen inspired from what dishonored had to offer. Run, weirdly float, teleport and stop time chasing yellow beams of light, because why not?

Made in a few days over the course of god knows how long, v1 is finally there, featuring a menu! And a multiplayer too, it should work but no guarantees.

Future plan: make randomly generated level system so you dont have to run around the same map for eternity

Controls:
- WASD to wasd
- LMB to stop time
- RMB to teleport (hold to aim, release to teleport)
- SHIFT to slow down
- Teleporting and stopping time costs energy (upper left corner)

Also there's a secret but its nothing big
